p:
The refractive index of oil was detected by a refractometer at a temperature of 25°C according to AOCS Cc‐7‐25 ( 1993). To measure the density of the extracted oil, a pycnometer was used (AOCS Cs 10a‐25, 1993). Briefly, the weight of empty pycnometer was recorded ( m 1),the weight of the pycnometer with distilled water ( m 2) as well as the weight of pycnometer with oil ( m 3) were measured, then the oil density (kg/m 3) has been calculated through the Equation 2.
(2)
